articles.title: Travelers, did you get stranded due to the blizzard?
articles.description:
Share your experience if flight cancellations, train delays, or road closures left you stranded during the blizzard.

The post Travelers, did you get stranded due to the blizzard? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Many travelers experienced significant disruptions during the blizzard on February 24, 2026.
Flight cancellations and train delays affected thousands of passengers in the Boston area.
Road closures led to increased traffic congestion and safety concerns for local residents.

articles.title: Boston Legacy FC announces New Kids on the Block halftime show for home opener
articles.description:
With over 20,000 tickets already sold, the performance promises to be a historic moment for both the team and the city.

The post Boston Legacy FC announces New Kids on the Block halftime show for home opener appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston Legacy FC will feature New Kids on the Block at their home opener.
Over 20,000 tickets have already been sold for the event.
The performance is expected to boost local excitement and community engagement.

articles.title: Blizzard leaves Cape Cod buried and struggling to recover
articles.description:
Power outages are persisting across the region as shelters see a surge in seniors and medically vulnerable residents.

The post Blizzard leaves Cape Cod buried and struggling to recover appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Blizzard buries Cape Cod under snow, disrupting daily life for residents.
Over 1,000 power outages reported, affecting seniors and vulnerable individuals.
Local shelters see increased demand for assistance amid recovery efforts.

articles.title: Man killed while clearing snow from vehicle on Mass. Turnpike
articles.description:
Police said the pedestrian was struck by a passing tractor-trailer.

The post Man killed while clearing snow from vehicle on Mass. Turnpike appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A man was killed while clearing snow from his vehicle on the Mass. Turnpike.
The incident involved a passing tractor-trailer striking the pedestrian.
This tragedy highlights the dangers of winter driving conditions for Boston residents.

articles.title: Healey lifts travel ban for southeastern counties
articles.description:
Gov. Maura Healey instituted a travel ban in multiple counties Monday amid a massive winter storm. Cleanup efforts are ongoing.

The post Healey lifts travel ban for southeastern counties appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Gov. Maura Healey lifted the travel ban for southeastern counties on Monday.
The ban was initially imposed due to a massive winter storm affecting multiple counties.
Cleanup efforts are ongoing, allowing residents to resume normal travel and activities.

articles.title: ICE scraps plans for N.H. detention center, Ayotte says
articles.description:
The Trump administration is working to buy and renovate massive warehouses around the country in order to detain more immigrants.

The post ICE scraps plans for N.H. detention center, Ayotte says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: ICE cancels plans for a new detention center in New Hampshire.
Former Senator Kelly Ayotte confirmed the decision on February 24, 2026.
Boston residents may see reduced immigrant detention nearby, impacting local communities.
